Property:Related metaphor

From EN MetaNet Wiki
Jump to: navigation, search

This is a property of type Record. It has the fields Property:Related metaphor.Relation type, Property:Related metaphor.Name, Property:Related metaphor.Description.

Pages using the property "Related metaphor"

Showing 50 pages using this property.

A

ABILITY TO ACT IS ABILITY TO MOVE +is an entailment of (ACTION IS MOTION, ?)  +
ABILITY TO EVALUATE GOVERNMENT IS ABILITY TO SEE +is a target subcase of (ABILITY TO EVALUATE IS ABILITY TO SEE, ?)  +
ABILITY TO EVALUATE IS ABILITY TO SEE +is a target subcase of (ABILITY TO KNOW IS ABILITY TO SEE, ?)  +
ABILITY TO KNOW IS ABILITY TO SEE +is an entailment of (KNOWING IS SEEING, ?)  +
ACCESS TO EDUCATION IS ACCESS TO AN OBJECT +is an entailment of (EDUCATION IS AN OBJECT, ?)  +
ACHIEVING A PURPOSE IS ACQUIRING A DESIRED OBJECT +makes use of (CHANGE IS ACQUISITION, ?)  +, makes use of (EXPERIENCING A STATE IS POSSESSING AN OBJECT, ?)  +
ACHIEVING A PURPOSE IS GETTING SOMETHING TO EAT +is a source subcase of (ACHIEVING A PURPOSE IS ACQUIRING A DESIRED OBJECT, desired object is food)  +
ACHIEVING A PURPOSE IS REACHING A DESTINATION +makes use of (MEANS ARE PATHS, ?)  +, is an entailment of (PURPOSEFUL ACTION IS SELF-PROPELLED MOTION TO A DESTINATION, ?)  +
ACHIEVING GUN RIGHTS IS REACHING A DESTINATION +is both a source and target subcase of (ACHIEVING A PURPOSE IS REACHING A DESTINATION, ?)  +, is related to (RIGHTS ARE TERRITORIES, ?)  +
ACHIEVING POWER IS MOVING UPWARDS +is an entailment of (CONTROL IS UP, ?)  +
ACQUIRING IDEAS IS EATING +is both a source and target subcase of (COGNIZING IS BODILY FUNCTIONING, ?)  +, is related to (IDEAS ARE FOOD, ?)  +, is related to (CONSIDERING IS CHEWING, ?)  +, …
ACTION IS MOTION ALONG A PATH +is a source subcase of (ACTION IS MOTION, ?)  +
ACTION IS SELF-PROPELLED MOTION ALONG A PATH +is a source subcase of (ACTION IS MOTION ALONG A PATH, more specific source domain)  +
ADDRESSING CRIME IS CONTROLLING AN ANIMAL +is in a dual relationship with (UNCONTROLLED CRIME IS A RAMPAGING ANIMAL, ?)  +, is an entailment of (CRIME IS AN ANIMAL, ?)  +
ADDRESSING ECONOMIC PROBLEMS IS TREATING AN ILLNESS +is a target subcase of (ADDRESSING SOCIAL PROBLEMS IS TREATING AN ILLNESS, ?)  +
ADDRESSING GUN VIOLENCE IS WAGING WAR +is a target subcase of (ADDRESSING SOCIAL PROBLEMS IS WAGING WAR, ?)  +
ADDRESSING POVERTY IS TREATING AN ILLNESS +is a target subcase of (ADDRESSING SOCIAL PROBLEMS IS TREATING AN ILLNESS, ?)  +, is an entailment of (POVERTY IS A DISEASE, ?)  +
ADDRESSING POVERTY IS WAGING WAR +is a target subcase of (ADDRESSING SOCIAL PROBLEMS IS WAGING WAR, ?)  +
ADDRESSING SOCIAL PROBLEMS IS TREATING A PHYSICAL AFFLICTION +is an entailment of (SOCIAL PROBLEMS ARE PHYSICAL AFFLICTIONS, ?)  +
ADDRESSING SOCIAL PROBLEMS IS TREATING AN ILLNESS +is an entailment of (SOCIAL PROBLEMS ARE DISEASES, ?)  +, is in a dual relationship with (INABILITY TO ADDRESS SOCIAL PROBLEMS IS INABILITY TO TREAT A DISEASE, ?)  +, is a source subcase of (ADDRESSING SOCIAL PROBLEMS IS TREATING A PHYSICAL AFFLICTION, ?)  +
ADDRESSING SOCIAL PROBLEMS IS WAGING WAR +has as transitive subpart 2 (SOCIAL PROBLEMS ARE DISEASES, ?)  +, has as transitive subpart 1 (DISEASE TREATMENT IS WAR, ?)  +, is both a source and target subcase of (NEGATIVELY EVALUATED CONDITIONS ARE HARMFUL AGENTS, ?)  +
ADVOCACY IS PHYSICAL COMBAT +is a target subcase of (ARGUMENT IS PHYSICAL COMBAT, ?)  +
ADVOCATING GUN CONTROL IS INSANITY +is a target subcase of (FERVENT ADVOCACY IS INSANITY, ?)  +
AFFECTION IS WARMTH +is related to (EMOTIONAL INTIMACY IS PHYSICAL PROXIMITY, New relation type: frequently interacts with)  +
AID TO KNOWING IS A LIGHT SOURCE +is an entailment of (KNOWING IS SEEING, seeing is aiding by a light source)  +

AIDS TO USING EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES ARE AIDS TO ACCESSING LOCATIONS ALONG A PATH +is both a source and target subcase of (OPPORTUNITIES ARE LOCATIONS, ?)  +, is both a source and target subcase of (EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES ARE LOCATIONS ALONG A PATH, ?)  +
ALTERNATIVE LEGISLATION IS ALTERNATIVE PATH +is an entailment of (LEGISLATIVE ACTIVITY IS MOTION ALONG A PATH, ?)  +
ALTERNATIVES ARE DIFFERENT AVAILABLE PATHS +makes use of (LIFE IS A JOURNEY, ?)  +

AMOUNT OF GUNS IS A FLUID +is both a source and target subcase of (MULTIPLICITY IS MASS, ?)  +, is in some target relation to (AMOUNT OF GUN VIOLENCE IS A FLUID, ?)  +
AMOUNT OF LEARNED CONTENT IS QUANTITY OF RESOURCE +is both a source and target subcase of (KNOWLEDGE IS RESOURCE, ?)  +
AMOUNT OF POVERTY IS SIZE +is a target subcase of (AMOUNT OF STATE IS SIZE OF OBJECT, ?)  +

AMOUNT OF STATE IS SIZE OF OBJECT +is an entailment of (STATES ARE PHYSICAL OBJECTS, ?)  +
ANALYSIS OF SOCIAL PROBLEMS IS DIAGNOSIS OF AFFLICTION +is an entailment of (SOCIAL PROBLEMS ARE PHYSICAL AFFLICTIONS, ?)  +
ANGER IS FIRE +is a source subcase of (ANGER IS HEAT, ?)  +
ANGER IS HEAT +is both a source and target subcase of (EMOTIONAL INTENSITY IS TEMPERATURE, ?)  +, is in some target relation to (PASSION IS HEAT, ?)  +
ANGER IS INSANITY +is in some source relation to (ANGER IS HEAT, ?)  +

ANGER IS THE HEAT OF FLUID IN A CONTAINER +is a source subcase of (ANGER IS HEAT, ?)  +, makes use of (BODY IS A CONTAINER FOR EMOTIONS, ?)  +, makes use of (EMOTIONS ARE SUBSTANCES, ?)  +, …

ARGUMENT IS WAR +is a source subcase of (ARGUMENT IS PHYSICAL COMBAT, ?)  +
ARITHMETIC IS OBJECT COLLECTION +is related to (MORE IS BIG, ?)  +
